homepage.title: Renoma â€“ Conservation and Heritage Preservation
homepage.description: Renoma is a company specializing in the conservation and restoration of historic monuments. We combine expertise, quality, and punctuality to protect cultural heritage and restore historical objects to their former glory.

about.title: About Us â€“ Renoma: History, Mission, and Values
about.description: Discover Renomaâ€™s history since 2012, our mission, and our values. Learn how we preserve cultural heritage.

services.title: Services â€“ Renoma: Conservation, Restoration, and Research
services.description: Renoma offers comprehensive services: conservation research, restoration programs, supervision, monument conservation, and construction work in historic buildings.

work-with-us.title: Work with Us â€“ Renoma: Join Our Team and Partners
work-with-us.description: Interested in collaborating with Renoma? Explore partnership opportunities and join a team of professionals dedicated to protecting cultural heritage.

projects.title: Case Studies â€“ Renoma: Successful Conservation and Restoration Examples
projects.description: Explore our case studies showcasing completed monument conservation projects. Discover effective strategies, modern techniques, and extensive experience that restore historical objects to their authentic character.

contact.title: Contact â€“ Renoma: Get in Touch
contact.description: Need consultation or want to start a conservation project? Contact Renoma. We offer expert support and an individualized approach.

renomaLab.title: RenomaLAB â€“ Conservation Laboratory
renomaLab.description: RenomaLAB specializes in conservation research: material analysis, paint layer studies, and assessments of moisture and salinity, all to support professional monument protection.

learn-with-us.title: Learn with Us â€“ Internships and Apprenticeships at Renoma
learn-with-us.description: Join Renomaâ€™s internship and apprenticeship program. Gain hands-on experience in monument conservation, develop your skills under expert guidance, and discover modern heritage protection techniques.

faq.title: FAQ â€“ Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about our services and company.
